overview: ANDREA WALLACE, age 14, is being bullied by the most popular girl at school, MIA TISDALE. Mia will stop at nothing to make sure Andrea’s crush, JAKE AUSTIN, wants nothing to do with her. That includes blackmailing her friend, ASHLEY FREELING, into sabotaging Andrea’s phone. But what Mia, and even Andrea doesn’t realize, is that an entire world exists behind the touch-screen, controlled by BYTES.
title: Like!
